name: Patience (RocRac)
description:
You’re trapped in a nightmare, induced by your own crimes. Hazy figures tempt you and it’s up to you to answer their call. Not doing anything is an option. Will you wake up or will this be your last dream?

Every decision you make has consequences.  Sometimes it's just better not to do anything.

Controls: Move with A/D or Left/Right

This game was made in three and a half hours for the Trijam gamejam. The last half hour was used for fixing any leftover bugs.
https://itch.io/jam/trijam-64

We streamed our development and have made a timelapse, which you can watch over here: https://youtu.be/eyUhkoNj4RQ

https://twitter.com/RocRacGames
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvlNduJgPCOfIC90FjpTI0g

Music and Sound Design by: https://twitter.com/FulminisIctus
